# __Unemployment generated by the onus of keeping people at home__

## Articles mentionning the risk

* [Silva_covid-abs_2020](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Article/PBN__Article_567.md)

## Mitigations of this risk

* [Implement policies and initiatives to support affected individuals, such as income support, job retraining, and mental health services](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Mitigation/PBN__Mitigation_16229.md)

## Name of the risk

Social and economic consequences, including financial hardship and social instability
